sentence: In Rebuilding Russia, an essay first published in 1990 in Komsomolskaya Pravda. Solzhenitsyn urged the Soviet Union to grant independence to all the non-Slav republics, which he claimed were sapping the Russian nation and he called for the creation of a new Slavic state bringing together Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, and parts of Kazakhstan that he considered to be Russified.

positive_examples.sentence: ...and opposition parties the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and Liberal Democratic Party...
positive_examples.entity: Communist Party of the Russian Federation
